args:
Regina and Sandalphon work to piece together

reports from the apostles' investigation into demon activity

But when they are summoned by the pope of the Ilian Church of Grams

They find themselves placed under arrest on suspicion of treason

Faris's team visits a priest who they believe has evidence that

Cardinal Graht is behind the recent string of incidents

They secure his help, but when his daughter is taken hostage

he kills himself and the apostles are arrested.

Meanwhile, Nevin's team infiltrates Rozcimea to gather intel on the demonic incidents
The vault's secure. Nothing to report.

Understood. I'll take watch from here.

Return to your standby location.
All right, let's get ourselves inside.

That took a lot longer than I'd hoped.

Security's surprisingly tight around here.

We've got less than a half hour before the next shift change,

so we need to find that journal right now.

Sealing stone... Five Archdemons...

Satan's resurrection...

Satan?!

That's what Basileus was after!
Anything useful about Satan's resurrection written in there?

Right, okay. This says the Five Archdemons were originally derived from Satan and

hold fragments of his flesh inside them.

Those fragments need a vessel to serve as their heart and drive them, so...

Oh, hang on. There's a note in the margin.

'Flesh and heart alone may not suffice.

What about the soul? Further investigation is required.'

Wish that last part made more sense, but at least we've got some intel on Satan's revival now.

Ramiel, you'd better report this back to Sandalphon.

...I can't!

Some kind of barrier is cutting off my link to her!

Just like what happened in Paradise.

So does that meanâ€”

The timing of that barrier and the blast line up too well to be a coincidence.

Papa Bear smells a trap.
We need to get out of here. Now!

See how they bear our form?

These are clearly the same demonic entities we fought previously.

Such numbers...

Just how many people did they expose to the miasma?!

Necessary sacrifices to protect this world,

I'm afraid.

Should have known I'd find you

slinking around this business, Basileus!
I had faith you would all arrive here.
Well, can't say I approve of your taste in welcoming parties.
How could you do such a thing?!
Actually, it was your meddling in my plans that forced my hand.
Your plan to revive Satan, you mean.

Yes. Once the sealed archdemons were all released from their mimicries,

my plan entered its final phase.

There are a host of conditions for bringing back Satan.

Are you truly claiming to havealready met them all?

I see you read the journal.

In that case, allow me to tell you a fun little fact...
The vessel required for Satan's revival... is me.

Are you mad?! You'll never survive that,

even with your strength!

And what of it? Salvation for the world atthe cost of a single life?

I can imagine no greater bargain.

How can you talk about salvation for the world

after bringing about this massacre?!

Because it prevented a far greater tragedy.

If the deaths of a few ensure the survival of the many, it is immoral not to do so.

Don't you dare speak to me of morality!

Salvation bought with blood is no true salvation at all!

Oh, my sweet, naive Pinon...

Your wordsonly serve to demonstrate what a privileged upbringing you enjoyed.
Just what do you mean by that?!
I have nothing further to say.

I'm afraid we aren't done speaking until you answer all of our questions.

...Nevin!

Sorry, Basileus,

but we're in a bit of a hurry and I need to end this!

content.content: Nevin's team infiltrates Rozcimea to gather intel on the demonic incidents, but no sooner do they find a lead than Basileus appears with demonic entities in tow.
